mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAMP ( CAMP_NO, CAMP_NAME, CAMP_ADDR, CAMP_PHONE, CAMP_URL, FACILITIES_INFO, CAMP_ETC, CAMP_CATEGORY, PERIOD, CAMP_OPTION, CAMP_MAIN_IMG, CAMP_DETAIL_IMG, CAMP_INTRO, AREA_CODE ) VALUES ( CAMP_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{campName}, #{campAddr}, #{campPhone}, #{campUrl}, #{facilitiesInfo}, #{campEtc}, #{campCategory}, #{period}, #{campOption}, #{campMainImg}, #{campDetailImg}, #{campIntro}, #{areaCode} )
mapper.select: SELECT CAMP_NO, CAMP_NAME, CAMP_ADDR, COALESCE(CAMP_ETC, '') AS CAMP_ETC, CAMP_MAIN_IMG FROM CAMP ORDER BY CAMP_NO ASC
SELECT CAMP_NO, CAMP_NAME, CAMP_ADDR, CAMP_MAIN_IMG FROM CAMP WHERE AREA_CODE = #{areaCode} ORDER BY CAMP_NO ASC

SELECT CAMP_NO, CAMP_NAME, CAMP_ADDR, CAMP_PHONE, CAMP_URL, FACILITIES_INFO, CAMP_ETC, CAMP_CATEGORY, PERIOD, CAMP_OPTION, CAMP_MAIN_IMG, CAMP_DETAIL_IMG, CAMP_SUB_IMG, TOILET, SHOWER, CAMP_INTRO FROM CAMP WHERE CAMP_NO = #{campNo}
